subject:
=?ISO-2022-JP?B?GyRCT0MkNz5lPGokSyRKJGsbKEI=?=
 =?ISO-2022-JP?B?GyRCSn1LIRsoQg==?=
body: But though motion and darkness, either alone, or attended with tangible and visible objects, convey no idea of a vacuum or extension without matter, yet they are the causes why we falsly imagine we can form such an idea. For there is a close relation betwixt that motion and darkness, and a real extension, or composition of visible and tangible objects.
